isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - GENERAL INFORMATION - 1991 - CONNECTOR AND TERMINAL IDENTIFICATION

svcproc.title: CONNECTOR AND TERMINAL IDENTIFICATION
svcproc.para: Connectors are indicated in the circuit diagrams with various symbols, with the connector number next to the symbol. Connector locations are shown by connector number in the connector composite section. Specific terminal arrangement and circuit identification are also shown in the connector composite views. The composite views will show circuit wire location, stamped pin connector markings, and the connector number.
